channel.title: Posts on John A. Hewson

item.title: Home
item.description: John Hewson Computer Scientist & Software Engineer (Co-)Founder Inkwell (2016) Web-based scientific and technical documents. Biblific (2014–2016) Academic paper management and mining. BitFactory (2006–2007) User-mode virtualization for packaging .NET apps. Projects elm-graphql Compiles type safe GraphQL queries to Elm. apache/pdfbox PDF library in Java. I’m a PMC member and contributor. confsolve Configuration solver for datacenter problems (OCaml, my PhD project).
